entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 06:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa steady
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
